ygData.subject: What weapons to use??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail to thee, I am of the 17th level and right now i duel Weild a Combine Long Sword and a Fine Steel Long sword (both same stats).  Right now I do about 24
ygData.messageBody:
Hail to thee, I am of the 17th level and right now i duel Weild a Combine
Long Sword and a Fine Steel Long sword (both same stats). Right now I do
about 24 each hand and since I am already maxed my level out in duel weild,
double attack and 1h slashing, I duel and double attack almost every hit. so
thast about 44-48 dmg per round.

I've always herd at high levels that you not only hit for 12 (sometimes 13)
but more... I've never seen this happen to me, when will I start hitting for
more? Whast going on with this area?

double combine long swords are great, but I need some advise...

I think when I hit lvl 20, I'm going to upgrade my weaponry.
Do I go for some PGT's or shold I try and go for some Painbringers or should
I even go for soem gnoulbanes? (BTW I am going to duel weild and want 2x the
weapon)

at lvl 20, what will be the idle and most level area weapon can I even get??
Thnx for your time.

Dealan
Of the 17th level
Karana
